moduleDescription: This module aims to introduce students to poetic techniques, fostering a deeper understanding and appreciation of poetry through active engagement.

moduleNotes.sectionNotes:
Interaction Duration (min) Activity Details Suggested SLS Tools
Student-Content 10 Activity #1: Students will explore different poetic techniques through a multimedia presentation. They will reflect on the techniques used in selected poems. KAT: Foster conceptual change, Facilitate learning together - This promotes understanding of abstract concepts in poetry and encourages collective discussion. Embed YouTube Videos, Embed Google Docs
Student-Student 15 Activity #2: In pairs, students will analyze a poem, identifying poetic techniques and discussing their impact. KAT: Facilitate learning together - This activity encourages collaboration and idea synthesis. Discussion Board, Team Activities
Teacher-Student 15 Activity #3: The teacher will lead a class discussion on the importance of poetic techniques, using examples from students' analyses. KAT: Foster conceptual change - This reinforces understanding and allows for real-time feedback. Poll, Interactive Thinking Tool

Interaction Duration (min) Activity Details Suggested SLS Tools
Student-Content 10 Activity #1: Students will use a template to create their own poems, incorporating various techniques learned. KAT: Enable personalization, Foster conceptual change - This allows students to express their understanding creatively and in a personalized manner. Embed Book Creator, Rubrics
Student-Student 15 Activity #2: Peer review of each other's poems, providing constructive feedback based on specific criteria. KAT: Facilitate learning together - This enhances collaborative learning through peer-to-peer interaction. Feedback Assistant, Discussion Board
Teacher-Student 15 Activity #3: The teacher will provide feedback on selected poems during a class discussion, highlighting effective use of techniques. KAT: Support assessment for learning - This allows for targeted feedback to guide students' improvements. SLS Learning Progress Dashboard, SLS Monitor Assignment Page

Interaction Duration (min) Activity Details Suggested SLS Tools
Student-Community 10 Activity #1: Students will present their poems to the class, explaining the techniques used. KAT: Facilitate learning together - This encourages a sense of community and shared learning experience. Embed Nearpod, Poll
Student-Student 15 Activity #2: Group feedback session where students discuss their presentations and reflect on each other's work. KAT: Foster conceptual change - This promotes deeper understanding through collaborative reflection. Discussion Board, Team Activities
Teacher-Student 15 Activity #3: The teacher leads a reflective discussion on the key learnings from the module and how techniques can be applied in future writing. KAT: Develop metacognition - This helps students articulate their learning and thought processes. Poll, Interactive Thinking Tool
